TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SessionStateUtility extends System.Object
public ref class SessionStateUtility abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供会话状态模块和会话状态存储提供程序使用的 Helper 方法，为 ASP.NET 应用程序管理会话信息。

span.span: Provides helper methods used by session-state modules and session-state store providers to manage session information for an ASP.NET application.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了会话状态模块或会话状态存储提供程序所使用的静态帮助器方法。The class provides static helper methods that are used by a session-state module or a session-state store provider. 应用程序开发人员将不需要从其代码中调用这些方法。Application developers will not need to call these methods from their code. 下表介绍会话状态模块和会话状态存储提供程序使用的方法的方法。The following table describes the ways the session-state module and session-state store provider use the methods. |方法Method|使用Use| |------------|---------| | 方法 method|可以通过自定义会话状态模块使用，以检索现有会话的会话信息或创建新的会话的会话信息。Can be used by custom session-state modules to either retrieve session information for an existing session or create session information for a new session.| | 方法 method|要添加到当前会话数据的会话状态模块通过调用并将提供给应用程序代码中通过属性。Called by the session-state module to add the session data to the current and make it available to application code through the property.| | 方法 method|调用的过程的会话状态模块或事件的请求，以清除从当前会话数据末尾。Called by the session-state module during the or events at the end of a request, to clear session data from the current .| | 方法 method|要获取对引用的会话状态模块由调用根据 Global.asax 文件中定义的对象的集合。Called by the session-state module to get a reference to the collection based on objects defined in the Global.asax file. 返回的集合是包含与添加到当前的会话数据。The collection returned is included with the session data added to the current .| 传递给和检索从当前会话数据作为对象或任何有效的实现的接口。Session data is passed to and retrieved from the current as an object or any valid implementation of the interface. 有关实现的会话状态存储提供程序的信息，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For information about implementing a session-state store provider, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了将会话信息存储在内存中使用的自定义会话状态模块实现。The following code example shows a custom session-state module implementation that stores session information in memory using a . 该模块使用类来引用当前并，检索当前，并引发**Session_OnEnd**为 ASP.NET Global.asax 文件中定义的事件应用程序。The module uses the class to reference the current and , retrieve the current , and raise the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application. 此应用程序不会阻止同步的 Web 请求使用相同的会话标识符。This application does not prevent simultaneous Web requests from using the same session identifier. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#1)] 若要在 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用此自定义会话状态模块，你可以替换现有引用在 Web.config 文件中，如下面的示例中所示。To use this custom session-state module in an ASP.NET application, you can replace the existing reference in the Web.config file, as shown in the following example. ``` ```

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

param.name: context
param.span: 要在其中添加 对象的 对象。

span.span: The object to which to add the object.

span.span: The implementation instance to add to the specified HTTP context.

summary.span: 把会话数据应用到当前请求的上下文。

span.span: Applies the session data to the context for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话状态模块使用方法要应用于当前请求的会话数据。The method is used by a session-state module to apply session data to the current request. 期间将发生这种情况请求的开始处的事件。This occurs during the event at the beginning of a request. 当前请求的会话数据检索现有的会话，或者创建一个新的会话。Session data for the current request is either retrieved for an existing session or created for a new session. 会话数据然后封装在实现实例，传递给方法以及当前。The session data is then encapsulated in an implementation instance, which is passed to the method along with the current . 提供的会话数据然后将提供给应用程序代码中通过当前上下文的属性。The supplied session data is then made available to application code through the property of the current context. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序自定义会话状态模块中的事件。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 自定义模块检索现有的会话信息或创建新的会话信息，并使用方法以将其添加到当前请求。The custom module retrieves existing session information or creates new session information and uses the method to add it to the of the current request. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#4)]

exception.span: 当前会话的 对象已添加到指定的 。

span.span: An object for the current session has already been added to the specified .

param.span: 要从中检索会话数据的 。

span.span: The from which to retrieve session data.

summary.span: 从当前请求的上下文检索会话数据。

span.span: Retrieves session data from the context for the current request.

returns.span: 根据当前请求填充了会话数据的 实现实例。

span.span: An implementation instance populated with session data from the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以由会话状态模块以从当前请求中检索会话数据。The method can be used by a session-state module to retrieve session data from the current request. 期间将发生这种情况请求结束时的事件。This occurs during the event at the end of a request. 返回的会话数据然后写入会话数据存储区。The returned session data can then be written to the session data store. 如果已放弃该会话，可以从数据存储中删除的会话数据和，并**Session_OnEnd**可以执行事件。If the session has been abandoned, the session data can be removed from the data store and , and the **Session_OnEnd** event can be executed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序自定义会话状态模块中的事件。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 该模块检索会话数据从有关当前请求使用方法。The module retrieves session data from the for the current request using the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#5)]

para.span: 可以使用方法移除会话数据从内部存储区，并方法来引发事件。

span.span: You can use the method to remove session data from the internal store, and the method to raise the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检索在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中定义的静态对象的集合。The method is used to retrieve the collection of static objects defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application. 会话状态模块实现将提供返回到集合添加到当前上下文使用的实现实例方法。A session-state module implementation will supply the returned collection to the implementation instance that is added to the current context using the method. 一个还可以使用方法创建时对象。A can also use the method when creating a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序自定义会话状态模块中的事件。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 该模块检索现有的会话信息或者创建新的会话信息，包括从返回的集合方法，并将其添加到当前请求。The module retrieves existing session information or creates new session information, including the collection returned from the method, and adds it to the of the current request. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#4)]

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 应用程序执行 Global.asax 文件中定义的 Session_OnEnd 事件。

span.span: Executes the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话状态模块使用方法来执行**Session_OnEnd** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中定义的事件。The method is used by a session-state module to execute the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 会话状态模块将调用方法时已放弃会话，或如果会话过期。A session-state module will call the method when a session has been abandoned, or if the session expires. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序自定义会话状态模块中的事件。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 如果已放弃该会话，该模块执行**Session_OnEnd**应用程序使用 Global.asax 文件中定义的事件方法。If the session has been abandoned, the module executes the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the application using the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#5)]
